attributes.additional_details:
Do you want more Crime?
If not then we need more youth clubs 89% of all youths commit crime because they have nothing else to do since the MP's cut most youth projects their has been the twice as number of youths committing crime or getting involved with gangs so if you don't want more crime or gangs then sign this petition. Most people judge youths and think they are all bad or criminals but if there were more things for them to do then we can change are future

rejection.details:
Not a matter for National Gvt, but local authorities working alongside communities:

see

http://www.youthgroupgames.co.uk/how-set-up-youth-group.html
